oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Wally Fowler at the Gospel and Spiritual All-Nite Singing at the Decatur High School Feb 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Martha White Foods; LeFevres; Fowler, Wally; Gospel music; Negro spirituals (oral or performed works)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red on yellow) Hatch poster announcing Wally Fowler's Gospel and Spiritual All-nite Singing with the Johnson Sisters, Wally Fowler, Statesman Quartet, the LeFevres and Blackwood Brothers at the Decatur High School Auditorium on February 5. Poster had handwritten corrections in pencil.
